articles.title: Britain, Poland report several outbreaks of highly pathogenic H5N1 bird flu in poultry - AsiaOne
articles.description: LONDON/PARIS - An outbreak of highly pathogenic H5 bird flu has been reported at a small poultry unit in central England, the country's farm ministry confirmed on Monday (Nov 8). All birds on the infected premises, near Alcester in Warwickshire, will be culle…

articles.title: Microsoft Visual Studio 2022 arrives - Channel Asia Singapore
articles.description: 64-bit upgrade to Microsoft’s flagship IDE ushers in new features to support faster, easier coding and larger, more complex projects.
articles.content:

articles.title: PHL ranks last in Asia-Pacific economic integration - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: THE PHILIPPINES has fallen behind in economic integration in the Asia-Pacific region as it registered the poorest performance in an index measuring 17 economies’ performance in 2019.

articles.title: New regional green bond index rules to take effect in March 2022 - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: MEMBERS of the Executives’ Meeting of East Asia-Pacific Central Banks (EMEAP) will adopt new rules on green investments through the Asian Bond Fund (ABF) by March 2022 to boost sustainable investments in the region.
